snippet.title: Doom 3 mod Endarchy - level 1
snippet.description:
Great mod! Download and play it right now!

http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewtopic.php?t=25569
http://endarchy.com/
http://www.moddb.com/mods/endarchy

Here's my review of it:

Just finished the first level, and I can say that this is a must-play release!

New level with new textures and atmosphere. These new textures fit into IdTech4 engine well!

The gameplay is cool: some demon and zombie hunting action, some searching for a way to advance, even some friendly marines!

I really liked the "that demon just never gave up!" joke :D

There is also a cool new GUI, including the endlevel screen which shows your achievements and challenges.

Finished the whole mod. Levels 2 and 3 offered some spectacular fights and the ending was very, very enjoyable!

The difficulty balance is excellent. I chose normal and it was challenging, but never too much - I didn't die, which I really like. Lowering the chance of ImpJumpHit is a great idea! Also reusing one NPC from the beginning of the game as a crazy guy was a clever idea! In the end, I started to hear that the "repairer" is answering to him and thought "Oh, I'm going crazy, too!" :D

The only flaw is that friendly marines are too unforgiving for my taste - hit them once and they hate you. I think that's too much, because it's too easy to accidentally hit one of them during an intense firefight - they must understand it, but they don't :(

The design shows excellent atmosphere of underground bunker.

In the end, the mod left me very pleased :)
